dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S797 IS: To extend the authorization for the Coastal Heritage Trail in the State of New Jersey.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Reid (for Mr. Lautenberg (for himself and Mr. Menendez)) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To extend the authorization for the Coastal Heritage Trail in the State of New Jersey.

section.text: Section 6(c) of Public Law 100â€“515 (16 U.S.C. 1244 note; 122 Stat. 827) is amended by striking 2011 and inserting 2018.
